metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44962 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the GCode::extrude() functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. A specially crafted stl file could lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
